    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminAttendanceReportsCenterPanel
    Represents the center panel for the admin attendance reports section of the UI.
    AdminCreateUsersCenterPanel
    Represents the center panel UI for the admin dashboard section where new users (Faculty and Students) can be created.
    AdminDashboardCenterPanel
    This class provides the main center panel UI for the Admin Dashboard.
    AdminDashboardPage
    Main JavaFX application class for the Admin Dashboard page.
    AdminEditUsers
    Provides functionality for editing user details within the administration panel.
    AdminManageAccountsCenterPanel
    Provides the center panel UI for managing user accounts in the admin dashboard.
    AdminUserRegistration
    Class responsible for creating the Admin User Registration UI components.
    AdminUserRegistration.FacultyRegistrationPanel
    Nested class representing the panel UI for Faculty Registration.
    AdminUserRegistration.StudentRegistrationPanel
    Nested class representing the panel UI for Student Registration.
    AdminViewAllUsersCenterPanel
    Represents the center panel in the Admin dashboard for viewing all users.
    AttendanceStats
    The AttendanceStats class represents attendance statistics for an individual.
    AttendanceStatusPanel
    Provides a panel UI to display the attendance status and history for a course.
    AttendanceStatusPanel.AttendanceRecord
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a single attendance record.
    CardIndividualReport
    Provides UI components related to displaying detailed individual student reports.
    ClassAttendanceSummary
    Represents a summary of attendance for a class, including counts of present, absent, excused, and late occurrences.
    ClassAttendanceSummary.MonthlyAttendanceSummary
    Represents a summary of monthly attendance statistics.
    CourseInfo
    Represents information about a course, including its name, section, and program.
    DatabaseAttendance
    Provides database operations related to attendance management, including fetching courses, students, attendance records, and saving/updating attendance.
    DatabaseAttendanceSummary
    Provides methods to fetch and calculate attendance data for students enrolled in classes.
    DatabaseConnection
    Provides a utility for managing database connections to a SQL Server.
    DatabaseDashboard
    Provides utility methods for dashboard-related database operations, including user and teacher statistics as well as attendance tracking.
    DatabaseIndividualReport
    The DatabaseIndividualReport class contains methods for retrieving information about students, courses, attendance summaries, and more from the database.
    DatabaseRegisterClass
    Provides database operations related to class registration, including adding classes, checking existence, enrollment, and fetching students.
    DatabaseRegistrationManager
    Manages user registration for different roles (Admin, Teacher, Student).
    DatabaseStatusAttendance
    Provides methods to retrieve attendance-related information from the database.
    DatabaseStudentViewMyAttendance
    Handles database operations related to viewing a student's attendance records.
    DatabaseSubmitExcuse
    Handles database operations related to submitting excuses, including retrieving teacher names.
    DatabaseUserProfile
    Handles database operations related to user profile images, including updating, retrieving, and removing the profile image path.
    DatabaseViewClassList
    DatabaseViewClassList handles database operations related to fetching class and course information for teachers.
    HomePage
    The main homepage of the application, showing the initial UI.
    IconHelper
    Utility class to manage and apply the application icon to JavaFX stages.
    Login
    Handles user login authentication by verifying username and password.
    LoginPage
    JavaFX application class for the Login Page.
    Notification
    Represents a notification with a unique identifier, message, timestamp, status, sender information, and the sender's profile path.
    RegisterClass
    Handles the logic for registering a class associated with a teacher.
    Session
    Manages the current user session throughout the application lifecycle.
    Student
    Represents a student with enrollment and attendance details.
    StudentAttendanceStatusCenterPanel
    A UI component that displays the attendance status for a student.
    StudentDashboardCenterPanel
    Provides the main content panel for the Student Dashboard UI.
    StudentDashboardPage
    Represents the main dashboard page for a student user.
    StudentIndividualReportPanel
    This class provides the UI panel for displaying an individual student's report in the student dashboard.
    StudentNotificationDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) class for handling student notification-related database operations.
    StudentNotificationPane
    Represents the notification panel in the student dashboard.
    StudentSubmitExcuseCenterPanel
    Panel for students to submit excuses for their absences.
    StudentViewMyAttendanceCenterPanel
    Panel for displaying a student's attendance overview with pagination and visually distinct subject cards.
    TeacherAddStudent
    Provides a dialog interface for teachers to select and add students to a specific class within a given course, section, and program.
    TeacherApproval
    Provides methods for teachers to approve or reject student excuses, retrieve enrollment and user information related to attendance.
    TeacherAttendanceSummaryCenterPanel
    This class provides the user interface panel for displaying a teacher's attendance summary.
    TeacherAttendanceSummaryCenterPanel.AttendanceRecord
    Represents an attendance record summary for a student.
    TeacherDashboardCenterPanel
    The TeacherDashboardCenterPanel class is responsible for creating the main content panel displayed in the center of the Teacher Dashboard.
    TeacherDashboardPage
    JavaFX Application class representing the Teacher Dashboard UI.
    TeacherEnrollmentStudent
    Handles the process of enrolling students into specific classes by providing a user interface for selecting and managing student enrollments.
    TeacherIndividualReportsCenterPanel
    This class provides the UI panel for displaying individual attendance reports for students under a specific teacher.
    TeacherMarkAttendanceCenterPanel
    The TeacherMarkAttendanceCenterPanel class is responsible for creating and managing the center panel used by teachers to mark attendance.
    TeacherNotificationDAO
    Data Access Object for handling notifications related to teachers.
    TeacherNotificationPane
    The TeacherNotificationPane class manages the notification UI components for a teacher user, including the notification popup, icon, and list of notifications.
    TeacherRegisterClassCenterPanel
    Panel for the teacher to register or add a class/course.
    TeacherViewClassListCenterPanel
    A panel that displays the list of classes associated with a teacher.
    TeacherViewClassStudents
    Represents the UI panel for viewing a list of students in a specific class.
    TickTockTrack
    The main entry point for the TickTockTrack application.
    UserDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing user data from the database.
    UserIconUpdate
    Utility class to update and retrieve the user's profile image.
    UserProfile
    UserProfile is a JavaFX Application class responsible for displaying and managing a user's profile interface, including profile image selection and update notification.
    UserRegistration
    Handles user registration logic for faculty and students.
    UsersModel
    Represents a user in the system, which can be an Admin, Teacher, or Student.
    ViewAllUsers
    A simple test or utility class to display all users categorized by their roles: Admins, Faculty (Teachers), and Students.
    ViewClassList
    Provides functionalities to view, edit, delete, and manage class lists for teachers.
